mapper.select: SELECT /* PaymentInfoMapper.xml, searchProdType, SAC 전시, 2014-04-14 */ CASE WHEN B.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD = 'PD012302' /* In-App 자식 상품 */ THEN (SELECT TOP_MENU_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD WHERE PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID) ELSE A.TOP_MENU_ID END AS TOP_MENU_ID ,A.SVC_GRP_CD ,CASE WHEN B.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD = 'PD012302' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IN_APP_YN FROM TB_DP_PROD A ,TB_DP_APP_PROD B ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP C WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID(+) AND A.PROD_ID = C.PART_PROD_ID(+) AND C.PROD_RSHP_CD(+) = 'DP010801' /* DP010801 : 부모-자식 관계 */ AND A.PROD_ID = #{prodId}

SELECT /* PaymentInfoMapper.xml, searchPaymentInfo, SAC 전시, 2014-06-12 */ A.PROD_ID, A.META_CLSF_CD, B.PROD_NM, D.PROD_AMT, CASE WHEN AP.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD = 'PD012302' THEN AP.SALE_STATUS_INFO /* In-App 자식 상품 */ ELSE C.PROD_STATUS_CD END AS PROD_STATUS_CD, A.PROD_GRD_CD, CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN A.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP13' THEN CASE WHEN #{ebookSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN A.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP14' THEN CASE WHEN #{comicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN A.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP15' THEN 0 WHEN A.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP16' THEN CASE WHEN A.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT25' THEN CASE WHEN #{musicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 1 END WHEN A.TOP_MENU_ID IN ('DP17', 'DP18') THEN CASE WHEN NVL(A.DRM_YN, 'N') = 'Y' AND #{videoDrmSprtYn} = 'N' THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN #{sdVideoSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END ELSE 1 END) = 1 -- 단말 지원정보 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE WHERE PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND (DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{dpAnyPhone4mm})) > 0 THEN 'Y' WHEN AP.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD = 'PD012302' /* In-App 자식상품일 경우 부모상품의 지원 여부 조회 */ AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE WHERE PROD_ID = (SELECT PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP WHERE PART_PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010801') AND DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd}) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS PROD_SPRT_YN, A.DRM_YN, UP.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD, UP.USE_PERIOD, AP.AID, A.MALL_CD, A.SELLER_MBR_NO, A.EXPO_SELLER_NM AS SELLER_NM, A.EXPO_SELLER_EMAIL AS SELLER_EMAIL, A.EXPO_SELLER_TELNO AS SELLER_TELNO, CASE WHEN A.SVC_TYPE_CD = 'DP001111' THEN MU.OUTSD_CONTENTS_ID WHEN A.SVC_TYPE_CD = 'DP001115' THEN VO.OUTSD_CONTENTS_ID WHEN A.SVC_TYPE_CD = 'DP001116' THEN EB.OUTSD_CONTENTS_ID END AS OUTSD_CONTENTS_ID, CASE WHEN A.SVC_TYPE_CD = 'DP001111' THEN MU.POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD WHEN A.SVC_TYPE_CD = 'DP001115' THEN VO.POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD WHEN A.SVC_TYPE_CD = 'DP001116' THEN EB.POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD END AS POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD, CASE WHEN A.SVC_TYPE_CD = 'DP001111' THEN MU.CHAPTER WHEN A.SVC_TYPE_CD = 'DP001115' THEN VO.CHAPTER WHEN A.SVC_TYPE_CD = 'DP001116' THEN EB.CHAPTER END AS CHAPTER, EB.BOOK_CLSF_CD, (SELECT PROD_NM FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP Z1 , TB_DP_PROD_DESC Z2 WHERE Z1.PROD_ID = Z2.PROD_ID AND Z1.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' /* DP010802 : 채널-에피소드 상품 관계 */ AND Z2.LANG_CD = B.LANG_CD AND Z1.PART_PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS CHNL_PROD_NM /* 채널상품명 */, RSHP.PROD_ID AS PARENT_PROD_ID, (SELECT PD.PROD_NM FROM TB_DP_PROD_DESC PD WHERE PD.PROD_ID = RSHP.PROD_ID AND PD.LANG_CD = B.LANG_CD) AS PARENT_PROD_NM, MCPM.MENU_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD A , TB_DP_PROD_DESC B , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD C , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE D , TB_DP_APP_PROD AP , TB_DP_EBOOK_PROD EB , TB_DP_VOD_PROD VO , TB_DP_MUSIC_PROD MU , TB_DP_USE_POLICY UP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG MCPM , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP RSHP WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND C.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND C.TENANT_ID = D.TENANT_ID AND A.PROD_ID = AP.PROD_ID (+) AND A.PROD_ID = EB.PROD_ID (+) AND A.PROD_ID = VO.PROD_ID (+) AND A.PROD_ID = MU.PROD_ID (+) AND A.PROD_ID = RSHP.PART_PROD_ID (+) AND RSHP.PROD_RSHP_CD(+) = 'DP010801' AND A.USE_POLICY_ID = UP.USE_POLICY_ID(+) AND MCPM.PROD_ID(+) = A.PROD_ID AND MCPM.BASE_YN(+) = 'Y' AND A.PROD_ID = #{prodId}

SELECT /* PaymentInfoMapper.xml, getAvailableFixrateProdIdList,결제시 상품 리스트(정액권), 김형식/SK플래닛, 2014-02-27 */ IV.* FROM ( SELECT PD.PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD PD , TB_DP_CMPX_PROD CM , TB_DP_PROD_DESC DC , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE PR ,(SELECT A.PROD_ID , B.PART_PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_FIXRATE_PROD_MAPG A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B WHERE A.PART_PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD = #{prodRshpCd} /*채널-에피소드 상품 관계*/ AND B.PART_PROD_ID = #{prodId} )PM WHERE PD.PROD_ID = CM.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = DC.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PM.PROD_ID AND DC.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TP.TENANT_ID = PR.TENANT_ID ) IV

SELECT /* PaymentInfoMapper.xml, getAvailableFixrateInfoList,결제시 상품 리스트(정액권), 김형식/SK플래닛, 2014-12-27 */ IV.* FROM ( SELECT PD.PROD_ID , (CASE WHEN FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD !='OR004305' THEN NVL(UP.POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD,'DP010603') ELSE '' END ) AS POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD , (CASE WHEN FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD !='OR004305' THEN CM.SERIES_BOOK_CLSF_CD ELSE '' END ) AS cmpxProdBookClsfCd ,CM.FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD AS cmpxProdClsfCd FROM TB_DP_PROD PD , TB_DP_CMPX_PROD CM , TB_DP_PROD_DESC DC , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE PR ,(SELECT A.PROD_ID , B.PART_PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_FIXRATE_PROD_MAPG A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B WHERE A.PART_PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD = #{prodRshpCd} /*채널-에피소드 상품 관계*/ AND B.PART_PROD_ID = #{prodId} )PM , TB_DP_USE_POLICY UP WHERE PD.PROD_ID = CM.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = DC.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PM.PROD_ID AND DC.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TP.TENANT_ID = PR.TENANT_ID AND PD.USE_POLICY_ID = UP.USE_POLICY_ID
AND UP.POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD IN ('DP010601','DP010603')
AND UP.POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD IN ('DP010602','DP010603')
AND CM.SERIES_BOOK_CLSF_CD IN ('DP004301','DP004305')
AND CM.SERIES_BOOK_CLSF_CD IN ('DP004302','DP004305')
ORDER BY FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD DESC ) IV

SELECT /* PaymentInfoMapper.xml, getFreePassMetaInfo,결제시 상품 리스트(정액권), 김형식/SK플래닛, 2014-02-27 */ IV.* FROM ( SELECT PD.PROD_ID , DC.PROD_NM , PR.PROD_AMT , TP.PROD_STATUS_CD ,(CASE WHEN CM.FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD !='OR004305' THEN PD.PROD_GRD_CD ELSE '' END) AS PROD_GRD_CD ,CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE SP WHERE 1=1 AND SP.PROD_ID = PD.PROD_ID AND 'Y' = CASE WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID IN ('DP17','DP18') THEN #{vodFixisttSprtYn} /* DP17 :영화 ,DP18: 방송 */ WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID IN ('DP13','DP14') THEN /* DP13 :이북 ,DP14: 코믹 */ CASE WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID='DP13' THEN #{ebookSprtYn} WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID='DP14' THEN #{comicSprtYn} ELSE 'Y' END ELSE 'Y' END AND (SP.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} or SP.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{dpAnyPhone4mm}) )> 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS PROD_SPRT_YN , PD.DRM_YN , UP.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD , UP.USE_PERIOD , '' as aid ,PD.SVC_GRP_CD ,PD.TOP_MENU_ID ,'N' as inAppYn , CM.FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD as CMPX_PROD_CLSF_CD , (CASE WHEN CM.FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD !='OR004305' THEN CM.SERIES_BOOK_CLSF_CD ELSE '' END ) AS cmpxProdBookClsfCd , PD.MALL_CD ,'' AS outsdContentsId , PD.SELLER_MBR_NO , PD.EXPO_SELLER_EMAIL AS sellerEmail , PD.EXPO_SELLER_NM AS sellerNm , PD.EXPO_SELLER_TELNO AS sellerTelno , CM.AUTO_APPR_YN AS autoPrchsYN , PD.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD AS autoPrchsPeriodUnitCd , PD.USE_PERIOD AS autoPrchsPeriodValue , '' AS autoPrchsLastDt , CM.BNS_CASH_AMT , CM.BNS_USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD , CM.BNS_USE_PERIOD , (CASE WHEN CM.FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD !='OR004305' THEN NVL(UP.POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD,'DP010603') ELSE '' END) AS POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD , (CASE WHEN CM.FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD ='OR004302' THEN /*시리즈 패스일 경우만 내려가게 수정*/ ( SELECT MAX(C.CHAPTER) FROM TB_DP_FIXRATE_PROD_MAPG A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B ,TB_DP_EBOOK_PROD C ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD D WHERE A.PART_PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.PART_PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND D.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND D.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' /*에피소드의 판매중인거만 수정*/ AND D.EXPO_YN='Y' AND A.PROD_ID = PD.PROD_ID AND (CASE WHEN CM.SERIES_BOOK_CLSF_CD IN ('DP004301','DP004305') THEN 'DP004301' WHEN CM.SERIES_BOOK_CLSF_CD IN ('DP004302','DP004305') THEN 'DP004302' END )= C.BOOK_CLSF_CD AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD =#{prodRshpCd} /*채널-에피소드 상품 관계*/ ) ELSE NULL END ) AS chapterText , (CASE WHEN CM.FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD ='OR004302' THEN /*시리즈 패스일 경우만 내려가게 수정*/ ( SELECT BB.BOOK_CLSF_CD FROM ( SELECT MAX(C.CHAPTER) AS CHAPTER ,C.PROD_ID AS EPISODE_ID ,A.PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_CMPX_PROD CP ,TB_DP_FIXRATE_PROD_MAPG A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B ,TB_DP_EBOOK_PROD C ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD D WHERE CP.PROD_ID =A.PROD_ID AND A.PART_PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.PART_PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND D.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND D.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' /*에피소드의 판매중인거만 수정*/ AND D.EXPO_YN='Y' AND (CASE WHEN CP.SERIES_BOOK_CLSF_CD IN ('DP004301','DP004305') THEN 'DP004301' WHEN CP.SERIES_BOOK_CLSF_CD IN ('DP004302','DP004305') THEN 'DP004302' END )= C.BOOK_CLSF_CD AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD =#{prodRshpCd} /*채널-에피소드 상품 관계*/ GROUP BY C.PROD_ID ,A.PROD_ID )AA , TB_DP_EBOOK_PROD BB WHERE AA.EPISODE_ID = BB.PROD_ID AND AA.PROD_ID = PD.PROD_ID AND AA.CHAPTER = BB.CHAPTER AND ROWNUM =1 ) ELSE NULL END ) AS chapterUnit ,(SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1)>0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM TB_DP_CMPX_PRCHS_POLICY WHERE SVC_GRP_CD = PD.SVC_GRP_CD AND TOP_MENU_ID =PD.TOP_MENU_ID AND FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD =CM.FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD ) AS packagePrchsYn FROM TB_DP_PROD PD , TB_DP_CMPX_PROD CM , TB_DP_PROD_DESC DC , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE PR , TB_DP_USE_POLICY UP WHERE PD.PROD_ID = CM.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = DC.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND PD.USE_POLICY_ID = UP.USE_POLICY_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND DC.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TP.TENANT_ID = PR.TENANT_ID ) IV

SELECT /* PaymentInfoMapper.xml, getExclusiveTypeInfoList,결제시 상품 리스트(정액권), 김형식/SK플래닛, 2014-02-27 */ DUP_PRCHS_LIMT_PROD_ID ,DUP_PRCHS_LIMT_TYPE_CD FROM TB_DP_DUP_PRCHS_LIMT WHERE PROD_ID = #{id} AND (DEL_YN = 'N' OR DEL_YN IS NULL)

SELECT /* PaymentInfoMapper.xml, getMappedProdByVoucher, 바우쳐에 매핑된 상품정보 조회, 정희원/SKP, 2015-08-25 */ CP.PROD_ID, MCM.MENU_ID, CP.TOP_MENU_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP RSHP INNER JOIN TB_DP_PROD CP ON CP.PROD_ID = RSHP.PART_PROD_ID INNER JOIN TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG MCM ON MCM.PROD_ID = CP.PROD_ID where 1=1 AND RSHP.PROD_ID = #{id} AND PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010803' AND MCM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MCM.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1
